title: Fans queue for PSG shirts bearing Neymar's name
description:
(4 Aug 2017) Hundreds of fans were lining up on the Champs-Elysees to get their hands on the first Paris Saint-Germain jerseys emblazoned with Neymar's name after his world-record transfer.
The shirts cost 155 euros (184 US dollars).
When posters of the Brazilian, accompanied by the words "Welcome to a Paris, Neymar Jr, 10" were unveiled on windows of the flagship PSG club store, the crowd cheered.
Michael Biancolin, who had waited more than three hours, was the first fan to leave the store parading a yellow PSG shirt.
The 25-year-old Neymar is due to be presented to the media at the PSG stadium later Friday, a day after his 222 million-euro (262 million-US dollar) buy-out clause from Barcelona was activated.
